column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////We were seated promptly
column2: and then helped by three different people. It was kind of amusing. One of the servers explained it was because they were in the middle of shift change
column3: so he wanted to make sure we weren't missed. We appreciated this - instead of standing back and waiting until tables were assigned and turned over
column4: several servers saw our table with no food or drinks in front of us and went out of their way to make sure we were taken care of
column5: even though it wasn't necessarily their table. We noticed
